text:
......Asahi-chan, this was your first time
with today’s choreography, right?

No, it was perfect......!
So perfect, it always surprises me......

......To be this good on the first try,
the trainer will be shocked.

......I was just as surprised
when I first met Asahi.
(It’s not just her ability to learn quickly)

Her fearless eyes,
and the mysterious charm that attracts people──

Even if I hadn’t met her then,
Asahi would──

Oh......you did really well.
To get this good on the first try, you’re amazing, Asahi.

Really? Then next,
I’ll show it to Fuyuko-chan and Mei-chan!

......Yeah, I’m sure
they’ll have a great reaction.
